name: WASHINGTON WINEGROWERS ASSOCIATION
description: Industry association for wine grape stakeholders in Washington State.
sampleDescriptions: All issues affecting the wine grape industry, anticipating that includes forest fire smoke exposure, specialty crop insurance, irrigation access, and promotion of domestic exports.
